channel.title: Server Question
channel.description:
What on your computer determines the max amount of people that can be on your server at once?
I'm pretty sure it's RAM...
My comp has 2.6GB RAM, so if it is RAM, how many people could log on my server with this amount?

item.title: Server Question
item.dc:creator: @Brandontan Brandontan
item.description:
@Brandontan wrote:

don’t host on your comp bad idea, if you have like skype and like 2 inet browsers up with server it’ll lag not only you but the servers out. especially with such little of raam. another bad thing if your inet ever goes out or you have to turn your computer off, a rollback will happen to any players online and the server will go off. so if i were you i’d get a 20 dollar vps for the month and try it out. i love it

Read full topic

item.title: Server Question
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Nothing on your computer alone determines the amount of people you can hold.

Read full topic

i think like 100 peoples
